title: php fatal error:  maximum function nesting level of '100' reached
body:
on branch stable45, i set up two new users this morning, usernames von and nach, to test sharing.

i logged in to von and it told me "scanning files" for quite a long time. i pressed f5 to reload, as i thought  von can't have files so it can't take long. after that i created a folder, put a file in and shared the folder with nach. 

than i logged in with nach. for nach, the browser window stays white and the apache error log shows this:
```
[wed nov 21 10:57:14 2012] [error] [client ::1] php fatal error:  maximum function nesting level of '100' reached, aborting! in /home/kf/oc/ocm/core/lib/base.php on line 74
```
